AMITriggers.description: This is the schema definition for the AMITriggers.
AMITriggers.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent the OEM attributes available under Triggers Instance URIs

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ControlTriggerAlerts.description: This property controls the trigger actions(LogToLogService/RedfishEvent/RedfishMetricReport) for Numeric Triggers.
ControlTriggerAlerts.longDescription: This property controls the trigger actions(LogToLogService/RedfishEvent/RedfishMetricReport) for Numeric Triggers.
